channel.title: [317] Conquest - Coming Soon
channel.description:
[center]Welcome to the project thread of the new server I am programming. This server is mostly based on PKing so you won't see much of an economy on this server. [img]http://i.imgur.com/TWjn20f.png[/img][/center]
[B][U][SIZE=3]Features:[/SIZE][/U][/B]
[ul][li][Anti-lag click based training (Only old members will really remember this). [list][li]Upgraded PvP system (credits: Jayden). [/li][li]All items obtainable (no donator only items, etc.). [list][li]Old-Style Pk Box (with a shop to spend points gained). [/li][li]Armour set exchanging. [list][li]Grand Exchange system (credits: Jayden). [/li][li]1250xp per click (950x HP). [list][li]Curse Prayer book, Ancients, and Lunar magicks. [/li][li]Working K/D ratio scoreboard in-game. [list][li]PKing outside of Varrock Bank. [/li][li]Unlimited stock stores. [list][li]Theiving for money obtaining. [/li][li]Duel-Arena for staking. [list][li]100% working Party Room (credits: Jayden). [/li][li]Working deposit inventory/equipment. [list][li]Working bank searching! [/li][li]Working XP Lock, Items on Death, and Equipment interface. [list][li]+ More (will be updating this daily).[/li] [/list]
[center]
[B][U]This is where you begin, inside both the bank and training area is safe outside is level 7 wild. [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/Home.png[/img]
We have a 100% working G.E. system in-game. [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/GE.png[/img]
All combat-based training will be done here using objects (door for strength, dummy for attack, haybales for defence, magical mirror for magic, target for range, and finally the altar for prayer). [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/Training.png[/img]
Here is where you can make money, the higher the level of the stall the more money you make. [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/Thieve.png[/img]
Here is the Pk Box it is level 21 wild, but you will not lose items upon death below will show a picture of the items in the store for Pk Box points. [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/PkBox.png[/img]
We also have a 100% working Drop Party system for player(s) to host drop parties! [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/Drop%20Partyu.png[/img]
We have quite a lot of shops to choose from, including tons of different items to buy for your character! [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/shops.png[/img]
Here is the armour sets working for players to buy and exchange kits for full sets of armour. [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/Sets.gif[/img] [/center][/U][/B]
Current Update: Update:
Added random Treasure Trail casket rewards while training, every time you click to train there is a 1:50 ratio that you may receive one. The chances of getting a good Treasure Trail item is based on a 1:25 ratio, otherwise you will either get a medium or low reward.
Thieving also got an overhaul as now not only can you recieve cash rewards but on this higher stalls you have chances of getting decent items to sell to shops for decent money (don't expect any 1M+ items but still they can help with getting cash).
The other update involves being able to spawn NPC's much like the old-style servers where summoning is in the Music tab, I figured this would also help with the nostalgia.
My questions for you are would you want to see either the PKing outside of the bank or the PKing in the Pk Box multi? Please let me know .
Also in today's update is armour trimming taking over the smithing skill.
It breaks down as so: Levels 1-20 Trimming of Wizard armour only. Levels 20-40 Green Dragonhide armour only. Levels 40-60 Blue Dragonhide armour only. Levels 60-70 Black armour only. Levels 70-75 Adamant armour only. Levels 75-90 Rune armour only. Levels 90+ Currently only Gilded armour.
Eventually this will be built on, and will include the making of Zamorak, Saradomin, and Guthix armour.
Also coming soon! Crafting will be re-done to include the following: Changing colors of items (such as whips, dark bows, infinity, void, and other items yet the levels are not yet thought out).
[b]Estimated time till online (beta): September 27, 2013.[/b]
Credits: Mad credits to Jayden for providing such a good base!
Comment below for any questions/concerns or even suggest an update it could very well be added in-game![/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/ul]

item.title: [317] Conquest - Coming Soon
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

This is the current layout of my new smithing system, working on the new crafting system for recolors, etc.
[center]

[table]

[th]Item[/th]

[/tr]

[/tr]

[td]85[/td]

[td]675[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td]90[/td]
[td]New God Armours (Bandos, Armadyl)[/td]
[td]750[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td]95[/td]
[td]Gilded[/td]

[/tr]
[/table]
[/center]

item.title: [317] Conquest - Coming Soon
item.dc:creator: @Skype1 Skype™
item.description:
@Skype1 wrote:

[quote=“MicroZoft, post:15, topic:532006”][quote author=Skype™ link=topic=650798.msg4368410#msg4368410 date=1380125096]
Even though it is a basic server i’ve always liked your work MicroZoft. You can count me in to test this as i’m sure the combat is good and that is all i’m looking for 8).
[/quote]

Thanks mate,

Update:

Added random Treasure Trail casket rewards while training, every time you click to train there is a 1:50 ratio that you may receive one. The chances of getting a good Treasure Trail item is based on a 1:25 ratio, otherwise you will either get a medium or low reward.

Thieving also got an overhaul as now not only can you recieve cash rewards but on this higher stalls you have chances of getting decent items to sell to shops for decent money (don’t expect any 1M+ items but still they can help with getting cash).

The other update involves being able to spawn NPC’s much like the old-style servers where summoning is in the Music tab, I figured this would also help with the nostalgia.

My questions for you are would you want to see either the PKing outside of the bank or the PKing in the Pk Box multi? Please let me know .

Also in today’s update is armour trimming taking over the smithing skill.

It breaks down as so:
Levels 1-20 Trimming of Wizard armour only.
Levels 20-40 Green Dragonhide armour only.
Levels 40-60 Blue Dragonhide armour only.
Levels 60-70 Black armour only.
Levels 70-75 Adamant armour only.
Levels 75-90 Rune armour only.
Levels 90+ Currently only Gilded armour.

Eventually this will be built on, and will include the making of Zamorak, Saradomin, and Guthix armour.

Also coming soon! Crafting will be re-done to include the following:
Changing colors of items (such as whips, dark bows, infinity, void, and other items yet the levels are not yet thought out).[/quote]

Very nice progress! I would suggest keeping the PKing outside of Varrock single as no players want to be teamed right outside of the bank. The PK Box on the other hand could be because of it being a SAFE Pking area.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Conquest - Coming Soon
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

[quote=“enzo42, post:10, topic:532006”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=650798.msg4367840#msg4367840 date=1380031598]
anti-lag? lmfao I haven’t heard that used since I was first introduced to the rsps scene in 2008
[/quote]

[code=java]import java.io.*;

public class antilag {
public int ResetTimer = 0;
public void resetserver() {
misc.println(“Resetting server!”);
misc.println(“Saving all players…”);
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
misc.println(“All players saved.”);
ResetTimer = 0;
closeListener();
runserver();
}
public void process() {
ResetTimer += 1;
if(ResetTimer >= 999999) {
resetserver();
}
}
public void runserver() {
try {
String run = ServerCP.RunServer;
String xstr = “./”+run;
Runtime.getRuntime().exec(xstr);
}
catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
}
}

public void closeListener() {
try {
server.shutdownClientHandler = true;
if(server.clientListener != null) server.clientListener.close();
server.clientListener = null;
}
catch(java.lang.Exception __ex) {
__ex.printStackTrace();
}
}
}[/code]

:D[/quote]

Damn, thanks this’ll work better than my current antilag handler. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Conquest - Coming Soon
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

[center]Welcome to the project thread of the new server I am programming. This server is mostly based on PKing so you won’t see much of an economy on this server.
[/center]

[SIZE=3]Features:[/SIZE]

[ul][li][Anti-lag click based training (Only old members will really remember this).
[list][li]Upgraded PvP system (credits: Jayden).
[/li][li]All items obtainable (no donator only items, etc.).
[list][li]Old-Style Pk Box (with a shop to spend points gained).
[/li][li]Armour set exchanging.
[list][li]Grand Exchange system (credits: Jayden).
[/li][li]1250xp per click (950x HP).
[list][li]Curse Prayer book, Ancients, and Lunar magicks.
[/li][li]Working K/D ratio scoreboard in-game.
[list][li]PKing outside of Varrock Bank.
[/li][li]Unlimited stock stores.
[list][li]Theiving for money obtaining.
[/li][li]Duel-Arena for staking.
[list][li]100% working Party Room (credits: Jayden).
[/li][li]Working deposit inventory/equipment.
[list][li]Working bank searching!
[/li][li]Working XP Lock, Items on Death, and Equipment interface.
[list][li]+ More (will be updating this daily).[/li]
[/list]

[center]

[B][U]This is where you begin, inside both the bank and training area is safe outside is level 7 wild.

We have a 100% working G.E. system in-game.

All combat-based training will be done here using objects (door for strength, dummy for attack, haybales for defence, magical mirror for magic, target for range, and finally the altar for prayer).

Here is where you can make money, the higher the level of the stall the more money you make.

Here is the Pk Box it is level 21 wild, but you will not lose items upon death below will show a picture of the items in the store for Pk Box points.

We also have a 100% working Drop Party system for player(s) to host drop parties!

We have quite a lot of shops to choose from, including tons of different items to buy for your character!

Here is the armour sets working for players to buy and exchange kits for full sets of armour.

[/center][/U][/B]

Current Update:
Update:

Added random Treasure Trail casket rewards while training, every time you click to train there is a 1:50 ratio that you may receive one. The chances of getting a good Treasure Trail item is based on a 1:25 ratio, otherwise you will either get a medium or low reward.

Thieving also got an overhaul as now not only can you recieve cash rewards but on this higher stalls you have chances of getting decent items to sell to shops for decent money (don’t expect any 1M+ items but still they can help with getting cash).

The other update involves being able to spawn NPC’s much like the old-style servers where summoning is in the Music tab, I figured this would also help with the nostalgia.

My questions for you are would you want to see either the PKing outside of the bank or the PKing in the Pk Box multi? Please let me know .

Also in today’s update is armour trimming taking over the smithing skill.

It breaks down as so:
Levels 1-20 Trimming of Wizard armour only.
Levels 20-40 Green Dragonhide armour only.
Levels 40-60 Blue Dragonhide armour only.
Levels 60-70 Black armour only.
Levels 70-75 Adamant armour only.
Levels 75-90 Rune armour only.
Levels 90+ Currently only Gilded armour.

Eventually this will be built on, and will include the making of Zamorak, Saradomin, and Guthix armour.

Also coming soon! Crafting will be re-done to include the following:
Changing colors of items (such as whips, dark bows, infinity, void, and other items yet the levels are not yet thought out).

Estimated time till online (beta): September 27, 2013.

Credits:
Mad credits to Jayden for providing such a good base!

Comment below for any questions/concerns or even suggest an update it could very well be added in-game![/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/ul]
